title: In the 8th grade, I took the Regents exam (a year in advance). What do I expect for 9th grade? - Quora

response.answer_text: I attended public schools in New York State, albeit more than a few years ago. You take the next regents exam when you finish the course work required for that exam. Regents Examinations - Wikipedia I took regents exams in: Geography, American History, World HistoryEnglish literature (three years rolled into one exam)Earth Science, Biology, Chemistry, PhysicsAlgebra (8th grade), Geometry, Trigonometry, Advanced Algebra/TrigFour years of FrenchAs you complete the course work you take the related Regents exam. When I took the exams (1965 - 69) they were only for the Honors courses, and I earned a Regents Honors Diploma.
